A suspected Russian threat actor compromised an institution in Ukraine that was featured in false Russian weapons conspiracies in the past.
Argentinian e-commerce giant Mercado Libre confirms "unauthorized access" to a part of its source, adding that data of around 300,000 of its users was accessed by threat actors.

CERT-UA reported mass distribution of phishing emails supposedly originating from Ukrainian state bodies and targeting Ukrainian entities. The lure is a Ukrainian language translation software, leading to the infection of GrimPlant and GraphSteel.
Ubisoft confirms it experienced a cyber security incident that caused temporary disruption to some games, systems, and services and forces a company-wide password refresh.
Vodafone launches an investigation after the cybercrime group Lapsus$ claims to have obtained roughly 200 Gb of source code files, allegedly representing approximately 5,000 GitHub repositories.

description: Spear phishing email was sent to an employee of a Ukrainian energy organization containing malicious files that would download and install a payload known as SaintBot (a downloader) and OutSteel (a document stealer). The same threat actor group targeted a Western government entity in Ukraine, as well as several Ukrainian government organizations back in March 2021.

Okta says it is investigating claims of data breach after the Lapsus$ extortion group posts screenshots in their Telegram channel of what it alleges to be access to Okta's backend administrative consoles and customer data. Few hours later the company confirms the breach: 2.5% of their customers are affected.

The Florida-based Leon Medical Center and Nocona General Hospital in Texas have suffered attacks from hackers that have resulted in extensive information about their patients being published on the internet.

Washington's State Auditor Office suffers a data breach that exposes the personal information in 1.6 million employment claims after a threat actor exploited a vulnerability in a secure file transfer service from Accellion.

The Reserve Bank of New Zealand is the victim of a cyberattack. The data breach occurred through a vulnerability in a File Transfer Application provided by Accellion that was targeted in mid-December and affected multiple victims.

California Health & Wellness joins the list of the victims of the Accellion breach.
The Durham Region joins the list of the victims of the Accellion breach.

Colorado-based short line rail operator and logistics provider OmniTRAX was hit by a recent ransomware attack and data theft that targeted its corporate parent, Broe Group
Sangoma has disclosed a data breach after files that were stolen by the Conti ransomware threat actors were published online after an attack.

A London ad agency that counts Atlantic Records, Suzuki, and Penguin Random House among its clients has had its files dumped online by a ransomware gang.

Researchers from Trend Micro discover a new campaign from the Sidewinder APT targeting government entities in South Asia. One of the targets is the Afghanistan National Security Council.
Researchers from Trend Micro discover a new campaign from the Sidewinder APT targeting government entities in South Asia. One of the targets is the Nepali Army.

Payment card processing company TSYS has suffered a ransomware attack. The attackers also stole and publishe TSYS data.
Sporting goods retailer Intersport has been hit with a Conti ransomware attack. The threat actors have dumped more than two dozen files as proof of access.
Warren-Washington-Albany ARC has some data leaked by the Conti ransomware gang.
Online education giant K12 Inc. reveals to have paid a ransom after their systems were hit by the Ryuk ransomware in the middle of November.
DoppelPaymer cybercriminals have attacked the network of Delaware County, PA government and are demanding $500,000 to free it up.
Electronics giant Foxconn suffered a ransomware attack at a Mexican facility. The attackers have demanded a $34 million ransom.
French multinational production and distribution firm Banijay Group SAS has been hit by a DoppelPaymer ransomware attack and had sensitive information stolen by the operators.
Gardiner Public Schools district are hit with a ransomware attack.
South Korean fashion and retail conglomerate E-Land Group said it has suspended operations at nearly half of its stores in the country due to a ransomware attack.
Chip maker Advantech has been hit by the Conti ransmware gang. The threat actor is demanding a $14 million ransom to decrypt the affected systems.
Reconstructive Orthopedic Center has been attacked by the DoppelPaymer gang who have added it to their leak site.
Parkland Corp. has suffered a rasnomware attack. TA505 started publishing stolen data.

Sky Lakes Medical Center is a victim of Ryuk ransomware.

Furniture manufacturer Steelcase is reportedly hit by a Ryuk ransomware attack.

Mississippi's Pascagoula-Gautier School District is hit by the DoppelPaymer threat actors.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Mitsubishi Electric discloses a security breach that might have caused the leak of personal and confidential corporate information. The breach was detected on June 28, 2019. It was later revealed that the breach may have resulted in the theft of data on a hypersonic missile.

organization: Rudolf and Stephanie Hospital in Beneov
description: The Rudolf and Stephanie Hospital in Beneov is hit with a Ryuk ransomware attack.

Using a new exploit named Aria-body, APT 30 attempted to compromise networks belonging to governments and state-owned companies in Australia and Southeast Asia. One of the group's targets is the office of Mark McGowan, Western Australia's premier. The hackers compromised a computer at the Indonesian embassy in Canberra and sent a malicious document to a staff member at McGowan's office from that machine.

event_subtype: External Denial of Service,Data Attack,Internal Denial of Service
description: The U.S. Coast Guard issues a security alert after a Ryuk ransomware attack takes down the network of a federally regulated maritime facility.
Maastricht University (UM) announces that almost all of its Windows systems have been encrypted by ransomware following a cyber-attack that took place on December 23.
Researchers from Palo Alto reveal a new wave of attacks carried out by a Chinese APT dubbed Rancor, using a new malware strain dubbed Dudell.

organization: Unnamed gas station in North America
description: Payments processor VISA says North American merchants who operate gas stations and gas pumps are facing a rash of attacks from cybercrime groups wanting to deploy point-of-sale (POS) malware on their networks. VISA has identified two specific attacks which were attributed to FIN8.

organization: Unnamed gas station in North America
description: Payments processor VISA says North American merchants who operate gas stations and gas pumps are facing a rash of attacks from cybercrime groups wanting to deploy point-of-sale (POS) malware on their networks. VISA has identified two specific attacks which were attributed to FIN8.
German media report that hackers from APT32 AKA Ocean Lotus, suspected to have ties to the Vietnamese government, have breached the networks of two car manufacturers, namely BMW and Hyundai.
German media report that hackers from APT32 AKA Ocean Lotus, suspected to have ties to the Vietnamese government, have breached the networks of two car manufacturers, namely BMW and Hyundai.

DiBella's Old Fashioned Submarines reveals that its stores in Connecticut, Indiana, Michigan, Ohio, New York and Pennsylvania may have had the information on as many as 305,000 payment cards compromised between March 22, 2018 and December 28, 2018.
The town of Dover's municipal computers are hit by the Ryuk ransomware. The attack was repelled swiftly and no ransom demand was made.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Researchers from FireEye discover new tools from the FIN7 group: a loader, dubbed BOOSTWRITE, that delivers payloads into memory and a module, dubbed RDFSNIFFER, that hooks into the remote administration software of ATM maker NCR Corporation.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Researchers at JPCERT reveal the details of a campaign targeting Japanese government agencies and exploiting a vulnerability in the local SkySea Client View software (CVE-2016-7836).
Researchers from ESET reveal the details of Machete, a cyber espionage group active since 2010, stealing sensitive files from the Venezuelan military.

Researchers from Morphisec Labs observe a new, highly sophisticated variant of the ShellTea/PunchBuggy backdoor malware that attempted to infiltrate a number of machines within the network of a target in the hotel-entertainment industry.
Metro Presort was attacked by the Ryuk ransomware gang. At the time, the company was serving 21 healthcare entities which may have been affected by the attack.
A Ryuk cyber attack takes down the data infrastructure of Johnson Newspaper Corp.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Researchers from Cybereason discover a spear phishing campaign targeting a financial institution, and installing a sophisticated backdoor called ServHelper to take over the network.
The personal information of roughly 3.1 million Toyota customers may have been leaked following an authorized access of multiple Toyota and Lexus sales subsidiaries.
Researchers of Palo Alto Networks reveal the details of an additional attack by the Windhsift APT, targeting a Middle Eastern government agency.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: German security officials detected a cyberattack, believed to be by the Russian group Snake, on the email accounts of German celebrities, lawmakers, military officials, and staff of several German embassies. As a result of the hack, the personal details of the victims were leaked online by the hackers. One of the victimis is German Chancellor Angela Merkel.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: German security officials detected a cyberattack, believed to be by the Russian group Snake, on the email accounts of German celebrities, lawmakers, military officials, and staff of several German embassies. As a result of the hack, the personal details of the victims were leaked online by the hackers. One of the victimis is TV presenter Christian Ehring.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts

As a result of the hack, the personal details of the victims were leaked online by the hackers. One of the victimis is German President Frank-Walter Steinmeier.
Cylance uncover a sophisticated state-sponsored campaign, tracked as Operation Shaheen, against the Pakistan Air Force, carried out by a nation-state actor tracked as the White Company.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of Sensors
description: Burgerville reveals a data breach impacting the chain which may have led to the theft of detailed credit card information belonging to customers.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Researchers from NetScout Arbor reveal the details of a new campaign carried out by the Cobalt Group via spear phishing. One of the targets is NS Bank.

description: Researchers from NetScout Arbor reveal the details of a new campaign carried out by the Cobalt Group via spear phishing. One of the targets is Patria Bank.

organization: Government agency in the Middle East
description: Researchers from Palo Alto Networks Unit 42 unveils a targeted attack against a government agency in the Middle East carried out by a threat actor dubbed DarkHydrus.
Researchers from Palo Alto Networks uncover a new operation conducted by the cyber espionage group known as Tick APT. The campaign targets a secure USB drive built by a South Korean defense company.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Vietnamese threat actor Ocean Lotus has released documents stolen from the Philippine government including a transcript of a phone call between President Duterte and President Trump.
Cybercriminals steal personal records and photos of patients from the data system of a Lithuanian plastic surgery clinic and put them up for sale.

organization: Three unnamed firms in the hospitality sector
event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts,Exploitation of Sensors
description: Trustwave researchers spot the Carbanak cybergang using a new socially engineered trick to spread point-of-sale (POS) malware to businesses in the hospitality industry.

A hacker known as Revolver or 1x0123 claims to have breached into AdultFriendFinder, posting two screenshots that appeared to show he had access to some portion of the website's infrastructure. Another notorious hacker known as Peace also claims to have hacked in.
Forbes reveals that the Carbanak Gang also breached 5 more cash registers providers.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of Sensors
description: The Carbanak Gang appears to have compromised a customer support portal for companies using Oracle's MICROS point-of-sale credit card payment systems, and used that access to steal administrative credentials and implant malicious code on 700 terminals.
Peace, the hacker who has previously sold dumps of Myspace and LinkedIn, lists 200 million supposed credentials of Yahoo users on The Real Deal marketplace. Yahoo confirms to be aware of the claim.
65 million passwords of Tumblr are on sell on the underground. The company admitted to have suffered a breach on May 12.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Clem Lefebvre, the creator of the Linux Mint Distribution reveals that an intrusion on the distribution's web site took place, in which hackers made a modified Linux Mint ISO, with a backdoor in it, and managed to hack the website to point to it.
A hacker called Peace claims to have stolen the entire database of the Linux Mint Forum (70,000 users).
Stealth Falcon, an allegedly UAE-aligned actor, targeted UK-based jouranlist Rory Donaghy for espionage purposes.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Vietnamese threat actor Ocean Lotus has compronised the websites of numerous entitities in Southeast Asia to be used for watering-hole attacks. Some of the organizations have also been targeted with malware aiming to install backdoors on their systems. The group has targeted ASEAN, China, Cambodia, Laos, and the Philippines.

This time Ouch hacks artazart.com and dumps its entire db on pastebin (6,795 records). Once again, to remove the db the hacker asks for a ransom of $20 worth bitcoins.
Ouch hacks csgameservs.com and dumps its entire database on pastebin (7,661 records). To remove the database the hacker asks for a ransom of $20 worth bitcoins.
A hacker called Ouch hacks freshfiction.com and dumps 6,402 usernames and hashed passwords.
NHS Dumfries and Galloway, part of the Scottish healthcare system, announces it was the target “of a focused and ongoing cyber attack.” The INC ransomware gang claims responsibility for the attack.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

organization: Leicester City Council. The INC ransomware claims responsibility for the attack.
description: The Leicester City Council is hit with a cyber attack.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Japan's Computer Security Incident Response Team (JPCERT/CC) warns that the notorious North Korean hacking group Lazarus has uploaded four malicious PyPI packages to infect developers with malware.
The Akira ransomware group threatens to leak nearly 200GB of stolen data from Bjuv Municipality’s systems.
The Akira ransomware group claims responsibility for a cyber attack to Quik Pawn Shop.
Germany's federal intelligence agency (BfV) and South Korea's National Intelligence Service (NIS) warn that Lazarus group's "Operation Dream Job," was also used against the defense sector.
The Douglas County Libraries is hit with a Play ransomware attack.

A threat actor with the moniker of 'emo' leaks the private emails of 15,115,516 Trello members, using an exposed Trello API to link private email addresses with Trello accounts, enabling the creation of millions of data profiles containing both public and private information.
Finnish IT services and enterprise cloud hosting provider Tietoevry suffers an Akira ransomware attack impacting cloud hosting customers in one of its data centers in Sweden.

event_subtype: Data Attack; Exploitation of Application Server
description: Schneider Electric suffers a Cactus ransomware attack in the company's Sustainability Business division, leading to the theft of corporate data.

event_subtype: Data Attack; Exploitation of Application Server
description: Lush, the privately-owned British cosmetics retailer is “currently responding to a cyber security incident.” Few week later the Akira ransomware gang claims responsibility for the attack.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: The Akira ransomware operation claims responsibility for a cyber attack to Denham, a denim brand in the Netherlands. Fey days later the company confirms the cyber attack.
